name: Kiiosk
overview:
Kiiosk.com is the simplest, easiest and most fun way to read the news! There are lots of News Readers out there, but the trouble is you have to go out and find all the news you want to import. In the Kiiosk, we’ve pulled news from thousands of sources and serve it up by category and topic, leaving you with great news and no wasted time trying to find it!

What’s more? Members (signup is FREE, of course) can comment, vote, save, share and interact with the news, and with eachother! We’ve made the social layers of Kiiosk easy as pie, with just a click you’ll be saving, sharing and voting your favorite news stories to the top of the popularity list!

We’ve also created a customizable platform for our members to customize their interface, define their own news topics and even sign up to get distributions of news (“NewsDrops”) automatically delivered to their inbox at intervals and times that they choose. We’ve made getting the news so easy, you’ll never have to leave your desk! We’ve also added nifty features like News by Email requests. You can simply send an email to newsdrop@kiiosk.com, leaving the subject blank, or populating the subject line with a topic of interest, and we’ll get right back to you with the news on that topic!

Last but not least, we’ve made Kiiosk completely extensible. Not ready to give up your current news reader? That’s ok! You can use our RSS feeds and get high quality Kiiosk news right in your current reader! (and you won’t even hurt our feelings!).
